diff_hunk:
@@ -5263,8 +5263,7 @@ def test_affine_grid(self):
             self.assertEqual(out_cpu, out_cuda)
             self.assertEqual(input_cpu.grad, input_gpu.grad)
 
-    @unittest.skipIf((not TEST_NUMPY) or (not TEST_SCIPY) or (scipy.__version__ < '1.0.0'),

body: Oh, I didn't know that's what that did... a general rule of thumb I have is that decorators shouldn't run the function, they should modify the behavior of the function when it is run
